sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0350 ( DPOB_CD , REATTY_YR , PAY_CD , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , REATTY_DDLNE_DT , REATTY_DDLNE_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #reattyYr# , #payCd# , #reattyStpDsptyNum# , #systemkey# , #reattyApptnSumJan# , #reattyApptnSumFeb# , #reattyApptnSumMar# , #reattyApptnSumApr# , #reattyApptnSumMay# , #reattyApptnSumJun# , #reattyApptnSumJul# , #reattyApptnSumAug# , #reattyApptnSumSep# , #reattyApptnSumOct# , #reattyApptnSumNov# , #reattyApptnSumDec# , #reattyApptnSumAggr# , #reattyItemNoteCtnt# , #reattyPymtYrMnth# , #reattyPymtPrcsYn# , #reattyDdlneDt# , #reattyDdlneYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0350 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# , PAY_CD=#payCd# , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN=#reattyApptnSumJan# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB=#reattyApptnSumFeb# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR=#reattyApptnSumMar# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR=#reattyApptnSumApr# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY=#reattyApptnSumMay# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN=#reattyApptnSumJun# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL=#reattyApptnSumJul# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG=#reattyApptnSumAug# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP=#reattyApptnSumSep# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT=#reattyApptnSumOct# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV=#reattyApptnSumNov# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC=#reattyApptnSumDec# , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR=#reattyApptnSumAggr# , REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT=#reattyItemNoteCtnt# , REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH=#reattyPymtYrMnth# , REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN=#reattyPymtPrcsYn# , REATTY_DDLNE_DT=#reattyDdlneDt# , REATTY_DDLNE_YN=#reattyDdlneYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , REATTY_YR , PAY_CD , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , REATTY_DDLNE_DT , REATTY_DDLNE_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0350 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND REATTY_YR=#reattyYr# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM=#reattyStpDsptyNum# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , REATTY_YR , PAY_CD , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JAN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_FEB , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_APR , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_MAY , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUN , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_JUL , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AUG , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_SEP , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_OCT , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_NOV , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_DEC , REATTY_APPTN_SUM_AGGR , REATTY_ITEM_NOTE_CTNT , REATTY_PYMT_YR_MNTH , REATTY_PYMT_PRCS_YN , REATTY_DDLNE_DT , REATTY_DDLNE_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0350 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
REATTY_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , REATTY_YR DESC , PAY_CD DESC , REATTY_STP_DSPTY_NUM DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0350 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
REATTY_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
